long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ever find yourself instinctively opening Facebook/Twitter/Reddit and seeing your productivity going down the tubes? Garlic gives you 15 seconds to reconsider.

Activate it on time sucking web sites you'll get a quote about productivity and enough time to ask yourself "is this what I should be doing right now?" 

Now get back to work.
